basics.name: Tengku Muhamad Hafizuddin Tengku Azmi
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Detail-oriented IT professional as a software engineer/prgrammer. Skilled at wide range of programming languages. Excellent written and oral communication skills; capable of explaining complex software issues in easy-to-understand terms.

work.name: Petronas Research Sdn Bhd
work.summary: Exploration Technology, Group Research & Tecnology is reasearch centre focusing on Subsurface imaging and attributes.
highlights: Develop machine learning model to predict the present of hydrocarbon using well logs data.
Setup and manages MATLAB license server.

work.name: Plisca (M) Sdn Bhd
work.description: Global information system (GIS) and land survey company
work.summary: Plisca provide GIS-IT total solution to various goverment agency including hardware supplies and ICT consultation.
highlights: Customize open source application to suit stake holder requirements.
Configure linux Staging (LAMP stack) for web application development.
Conduct application training for targeted user.

work.name: GATES IT Solutions Sdn Bhd
work.summary: Software house that serve goverment agency. Their service include developing accounting system and university managment system.
highlights: Learn to comunicate with project stakeholder capture their requirements.
Learn project management by Practicing SCRUM methodology.

courses: BIT33503 - Degree Project (Food Stall Evaluation System)

awards.title: Second place in the EAGE Earth-Hack Hackaton
awards.summary: The EAGE Earth-Hack Hackathon, a two and a half day event will be held in Kuala Lumpur on 22nd – 24th February 2019, where software developers, engineers and geoscientists will spend intensive hours to hack, test and experiment with the latest advancements in machine learning algorithms against subsurface data such as seismic, logs, cores, to solve data mining, geological interpretation, and quantitative reservoir characterization problems.

awards.title: HCNA-HNTD
awards.summary: Huawei Certified Network Associate – Huawei Network Technology and Device

projects.name: MPM ABCO
projects.description: Developing and maintaining code for MPM (Malaysia Petroleum Management) ABCO (Automated Behind Casing Opportunity) project that is machine learning project that able to predict the presence of Hydrocarbon using input from well logs. Mainly involve with data preprocessing which is clean up the well log data by removing outliers, filling null data and normalizing the dataset
highlights: uses Python as the programming language and Pytorch python library for machine learning purpose

projects.name: GIOS
projects.description: Develop and maintain the GIOS (Geospatial Online Image Service) Server Administration Service that acts as an administration system for internal staff. GIOS consist of two parts, GIOS Image Portal (public) and GIOS Server Administration Service (internal) which can be used by surveyors to view data such orthophoto, scanned topography image, satellite image and synthetic aperture radar (SAR) image before buying them from JUPEM.
highlights: using Python programming and Django 1.6.11 as its framework
use PostgreSQL as its relational database
project is a customization of Geonode, web-based application and platform for developing geospatial information systems (GIS) and for deploying spatial data infrastructures (SDI)
uses GeoServer for server for sharing geospatial data

projects.name: sisMPK
projects.description: Maintaining and developing Harta Sewa module, covering all rental property for Kuantan Municipal Council.
highlights: Using PHP with in-house MVC framework
